title: FS: t206 Southern League SL Set – 48 cards - SOLD
author: sac_bunt

posts.post_title: FS: t206 Southern League SL Set – 48 cards - SOLD
posts.post_content:
After several years of putting together this Southern League set and finally completing it, I have decided to part with it.
Overall condition is low grade, but there are a some in G/VG condition + a couple EX with clipped corners.
43 raw and 5 slabbed – combo of Piedmont & Old Mill backs

Asking $OLD

Shipping included 
Paypal f/f preferred
I’m not interested in selling individually.

Shoot me a PM if you want to break it up. 

Sent from my SM-G900V using Tapatalk

Jeff,

I'll take them.

PM to follow.

Thanks, Scott
